item.title: Hugo Blog On GitHub Pages
item.description: Looking to create your personal blog using Hugo and hosting it on GitHub Pages? To be honest, it can sound a bit intimidating and challenging at first. I, too, felt the same while I setup this blog using Hugo and the Coder theme. In this post, I share my experience during the process - from the specific commands to the lessons learnt. In addition to this, I also share my workflow for publishing posts using a shell script.
